:• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1350 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1350 Wi-Fi Range extender, AV1300 Powerline Edition}} {{SupportPage|http://uk.tp-link.com/download/TL-WPA8630-KIT_V2.html}} (UK) {{SupportPage|http://www.tp-link.com.pl/download/TL-WPA8630-KIT_V2.html}} (PL) {{•}} [http://static.tp-link.com/TL-WPA8630%20KIT(UK)_V2_Datasheet.pdf Datasheet] Sold as part of the TP-LINK TL-WPA8630 KIT V2 which includes :this TL-WPA8630 v2 and a [[TP-LINK TL-PA8010]] [https://www.tp-link.com/us/support/download/tl-pa8010p-kit/v2/ v2] *Web Management: http://tplinkplc.net {{See also|TP-LINK WPA series}}
